name: @toshusai/cmpui
description: CmpUI is a component library designed for creating complex GUI applications in web browsers.

scripts.storybook:test:ci: concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "pnpm storybook:build && npx http-server storybook-static --port 6006 --silent" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:6006 && pnpm storybook:test"

author: toshusai
